title: having sync problem when syncing large number of files (around 200000 files).
body:
i am having issues in syncing large amount of document files (200000 files around 110gb of data). i have two servers one is centos 6 with owncloud server (5.0.9) installed on it and a windows 2008 server as client of owncloud (owncloud client version 1.3). windows 2008 server sharing a folder on lan as network drive. i wanted windows 2008 shared folder (shared on lan as network drive) to sync on centos server using owncloud. i am having problems in syncing whenever during the sync process if a windows server restarts the sync process could not start again. 


here are the logs on admin web interface:

fatal	php	datetime::__construct(): failed to parse time string (-1139138652) at position 9 (5): unexpected character at /var/www/html/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/property/getlastmodified.php#39	july 23, 2013 9:57
fatal	php	datetime::__construct(): failed to parse time string (-1139138652) at position 9 (5): unexpected character at /var/www/html/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/property/getlastmodified.php#39	july 22, 2013 18:05
fatal	php	datetime::__construct(): failed to parse time string (-1139138652) at position 9 (5): unexpected character at /var/www/html/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/property/getlastmodified.php#39	july 22, 2013 16:41
fatal	php	datetime::__construct(): failed to parse time string (-1139138652) at position 9 (5): unexpected character at /var/www/html/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/property/getlastmodified.php#39	july 22, 2013 15:28
fatal	php	datetime::__construct(): failed to parse time string (-1139138652) at position 9 (5): unexpected character at /var/www/html/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/property/getlastmodified.php#39	july 22, 2013 13:08
fatal	php	datetime::__construct(): failed to parse time string (-1139138652) at position 9 (5): unexpected character at /var/www/html/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/property/getlastmodified.php#39	july 22, 2013 12:11
